prompt: Create a compact order tracking page with white background and card-based layout. Display order number '#ORD-2024-005' in header card with red 'Order Placed' status badge. Include horizontal progress bar with 4 stages: Order Placed (current, red), Processing (pending, gray), Shipped (pending, gray), and Delivered (pending, gray). Show estimated delivery as 'March 25, 2024'. Add order summary card with placeholder image, item name 'Laptop Stand', quantity 'Qty: 1', and price '$29.99'. Include delivery address card for 'Emma Davis', '654 Birch St, Austin, TX 78701', and phone. Add carrier card with 'FedEx' and tracking number. Place red 'Track Package' elevated button and gray 'Contact Support' outlined button in bottom card. Use tight spacing, sharp corners, and minimal shadows for clean look.
